instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.A1466: What is A1466? A1466 is a model number for a 13 inch size MacBook Air from years Early 2015, 2017, Mid 2012, Mid 2013, Early 2014 with EMC 2925, that may contain one of these boards depending on the year & configuration: 820-00165, 820-3209, 820-3437..

threads.title: Need to transfer data from mac air <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1466</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> 2015 ssd looking for 2.5" adapter
threads.message: I thought I was buying an adapter so that I can plug in a <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1466</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> 2015 ssd to 2.5" sata adapter, I got it today but its pci-e x4 not 2.5" form lol..Any ideas besides having a working mother board...

threads.title: Need to transfer data from mac air <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1466</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> 2015 ssd looking for 2.5" adapter
threads.message: Well no of course, get the right adapter or get a working machine.

threads.title: Need to transfer data from mac air <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1466</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> 2015 ssd looking for 2.5" adapter
threads.message: I looked on the net for it but can't find one :(. The only one I could find one was the pci e x4

threads.title: Need to transfer data from mac air <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1466</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> 2015 ssd looking for 2.5" adapter
threads.message: If you have macbook air SSD to M.2 PCIE now just get a M.2 to USB adapter.
